author: Staff Reporter
text: A 28-year-old man was hacked to death by a group of armed men at Kadapakkam in Kancheepuram district on Wednesday morning. Police said Vasanth Rajagopal, son of village administrative officer Rajagopal of Kappivakkam near Kadapakkam, was on his morning walk when the incident took place. Chunambedu police registered a case and have sent the body to Chengalpattu Government General Hospital for a post-mortem examination.
title: VAO’s son hacked to death
